analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xd8f638bc424efaa66eabc42ba5ce3fea4455c405.sol:
	Contract LongHashERC20Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xd8f638bc424efaa66eabc42ba5ce3fea4455c405.sol#109-110)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
